manipulators.description: Change right option to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)
[Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes
Change right option to Hyper (i.e., command+control+option+shift)
[Firefox] Use command+shift+n to open new private browsing window
[Apple Mail] Use command+shift+f to search across all mailboxes
